projects.name: SFIT college app
projects.shortDescription: Android application for St. Francis Institute of Technology. App is for students and teachers with modern material UI.
projects.description: Android application for SFIT. This application has functionality for students and teachers both. Students can perform almost all actions which are available on erp including view attendance, marks, news, etc. Teachers can create modify polls on app which are sent to students in real time.

projects.name: Beach resort react
projects.shortDescription: A hotel reservation website created using React.js.

projects.name: Mock Website
projects.shortDescription: A mock website showcasing login/signup forms, pinterest like gallery, amazon like e-commerce showcase and about me page.
projects.description: A mock website showcasing login/signup forms, pinterest like gallery, amazon like e-commerce showcase and about me page.

projects.name: Github nostalgia
projects.shortDescription: Chrome extension to modify GitHub profile dom.
projects.description: Chrome extension to modify GitHub profile dom. This extension will customize GitHub to look similar to the old design. Also added ability to auto format the url of a currently playing YouTube video and display with current timestamp that you are on

projects.name: Trice
projects.shortDescription: My Arch linux configuration files, specifically for i3 window manager.
projects.description: Majority of this config is derived from Luke Smith's i3wm configuration. I have derived my config from a lot of different sources. I have made a lot of major changes. Named Trice because i use two machines, a desktop pc 'Lenovo ThinkCenter' and a laptop 'Lenovo ThinkPad', hence "Trice"!!(Also because i could not think of anything else).

projects.name: Exam marks confirmation
projects.shortDescription: Semester 5 java mini project which allows students to fill their internal exam marks themselves
projects.description: Semester 5 java mini project which allows students to fill their internal exam marks themselves. This project was made using JavaFX and JPheonix Material design libraries, font-awesome icons. The main purpose of this project was to showcase database operations. This project also includes dynamic tables.

projects.name: Meme Generator
projects.shortDescription: A basic meme generator using react and random images.
projects.description: A basic meme generator which takes top and bottom text and overlays it above a random meme image taken from meme generator api.

projects.name: Shopping cart flutter
projects.shortDescription: A basic shopping cart application built with flutter
projects.description: A basic shopping cart application built with flutter with barcode scanning function to add items to cart, credit card info screen. This app uses basic static github api as previous api was deprecated, retaining all previous logic

projects.name: To-Do App
projects.shortDescription: A basic todo web app using introductory React
projects.description: A basic todo web app using introductory React

projects.name: Php product manager
projects.shortDescription: A simple php project. Includes a prime number generator withing given range and product manager using ajax
projects.description: Using this you can add entry to database and perform delete action. All actions are performed asynchronously using AJAX. Database used is mysql with backend as php. Also includes a prime number generator withing given range.

projects.name: Login Page
projects.description: A login page I designed for my Semester 5 short projects. I referenced the design from a pinterest photo and tried to recreate it.

projects.name: Django basic portfolio
projects.shortDescription: A basic portfolio website using Django which also includes a contact page.
projects.description: Converted a static portfolio page into a django website. This project includes a contact manager with a form

projects.name: Home Page
projects.shortDescription: A home page design website using vanilla html, css.
projects.description: Sem 5 short project. Home page reference taken from valorant, Sass and other websites. This project was really helpfull for learning some css concepts like ::before and ::after, transforms, etc.

projects.name: Email Client JavaFX
projects.shortDescription: A basic email client using JavaFX and gmail
projects.description: A basic email client using JavaFX and gmail. Displays multiple inboxes.

projects.name: JavaScript Mini Project
projects.shortDescription: Javascript image carousel, calculator and email validator.
projects.description: This project includes a javascript image carousel with pause and reset options along with option to set custom interval. A calculator with actual buttons and finally an email validator using regex.

projects.name: Pattern
projects.shortDescription: Algorithms in C for generating basic patterns
projects.description: Algorithms in C for generating basic patterns

projects.name: CSS Basic Animations
projects.shortDescription: CSS basic animations source code for reference

projects.name: Building database applications in PHP
projects.shortDescription: This repository includes course files for the - Building database applications in php Coursera. Includes assignments for week2, week4 and week5.Main CRUD application in week5
projects.description: This repository includes course files for the - Building database applications in php Coursera. Includes assignments for week2, week4 and week5.Main CRUD application in week5
